Package dbdiffchecker

Class DbConn

java.lang.Object
dbdiffchecker.DbConn
Direct Known Subclasses:
CouchbaseConn, MongoConn, SQLDbConn
public abstract class DbConn
extends java.lang.Object
Establishes a connection with a database and runs the necessary statements to get schema information.
Since:
5-24-19

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    DbConn()
    This is the default constructor for this class, Needed for Serialization.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract void closeDatabaseConnection()
    Closes the connection to the database.
    abstract void establishDatabaseConnection()
    Makes a connection to the database using the necessary information.
    abstract java.lang.String getDatabaseName()
    Returns the name of the database to connect to.
    abstract void runStatement​(java.lang.String Statement)
    Takes a statement and attempts to run it.
    protected abstract void testConnection()
    Attempts to connect to the database and responds accordingly.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DbConn

      public DbConn()
      This is the default constructor for this class, Needed for Serialization.

  • Method Details

    • getDatabaseName

      public abstract java.lang.String getDatabaseName()
      Returns the name of the database to connect to.
      Returns:
      The name of the database to connect to.

    • establishDatabaseConnection

      public abstract void establishDatabaseConnection() throws DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException
      Makes a connection to the database using the necessary information.
      Throws:
      DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException - Error when connecting to the database.

    • closeDatabaseConnection

      public abstract void closeDatabaseConnection() throws DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException
      Closes the connection to the database.
      Throws:
      DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException - Error when closing the connection to the database.

    • runStatement

      public abstract void runStatement​(java.lang.String Statement) throws DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException
      Takes a statement and attempts to run it.
      Parameters:
      Statement - The statement to run on the connected database.
      Throws:
      DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException - An error when running the SQL statement.

    • testConnection

      protected abstract void testConnection() throws DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException
      Attempts to connect to the database and responds accordingly.
      Throws:
      DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException - Error attempting to connect to the database (it might be unavailable).
